One useful tip: many games won't work on cfw and gives error or simple even don't start.
You must enable "Use version txt" option in recovery menu. Then many games work fine.

I got the damn thing to work using ISOTOOL 1.52!

BUT FIRST OF ALL, you need:
1. unadultered/unpatched/fresh .iso file of the game (look for torrents containing file psy-mgspw.iso, I got mine from here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5607981/Metal_Gear_Solid_Peace_Walker_USA_PSP_%5Bwww.forodescargasdirectas

2. You need a unit with CFW 5.00 m33-6

My current FW is 5.00 m33-6 in a FAT-100?.

1. I just downloaded ISOTOOL 1.52 and the latest PROMETHEUS v0.3 from psp-hacks.com.

2. Then I overwritten the PROMETHEUS folder in ISOTOOL with the contents of the latest PROMETHEUS.

3. I then copied the whole ISOTOOL folder into the PSP's memory stick (under PSP/GAME folder)

4. Then I copied the iso file psy-mgspw.iso (downloaded from another torrent) to the ISO folder.

5. I just ran ISOTOOL in the PSP, DECRYPTED the .iso file (saying YES to the 3 questions), then PATCHED the .iso file using the PROMETHEUS option in ISOTOOL.

6. After that I was playing for an hour straight with no problems.

It's my first time to patch an .iso file and it was such a no brainer. I never thought I could do it.

Mabuhay ang mga Pinoy! Yeah!

If you have a PSP running GEN-D3 and want to play MGS: Peace Walker this is what you do. There's a program that allows you to change from D3 to D2 flawlessly. Peace Walker works fine on D2. Other games won't play so you'll have to switch from D2 to D3 but that shouldn't be that much trouble. Here's the D2 Switcher:

http://www.psp-hacks.com/2010/06/11/5-50-gen-d2-d3-switcher-released/

Hi, I have a problem. Game works fine, but i am in level, in undegroudn base, after i defeated Cocoon and there are the doors, which iI can´t open. The game says, that I need to pressing one button, but it doesn´t work. Somebody who finished MGS PW, any advice?

@ raziel 

Use the elevator.

when you start the mission make the first right, and on the right you will see a group of dudes saying to guard the elevator.  thats where you go and from the rest is go straight until you get to a door thats closed.  you used the action button ( depending on your settings ) up on the d - pad .  you then button mash the button to get the door open and get ready to play again the boss so to speak lol
I´am pressing like a bitch, but no reaction. Snake can´t open that door...

dude knock out all the guards.  go to the control panel on the right side not the elevator its self.  the panel is right next to the elevator, and then you should go through.  don't go in alert mode either.  you have to be in a normal alert mode, like the one that it starts you off in that mission
